methods.name: bind
methods.signature: func bind(_ mods: JSValue, _ key: String, _ callbackPressed: JSValue, _ callbackReleased: JSValue) -> HSHotkeyObject?
methods.documentation:
Bind a hotkey
- Parameters:
- mods: An array of modifier key strings (e.g., ["cmd", "shift"])
- key: The key name or character (e.g., "a", "space", "return")
- callbackPressed: A JavaScript function to call when the hotkey is pressed
- callbackReleased: A JavaScript function to call when the hotkey is released
- Returns: A hotkey object, or nil if binding failed

returns.description: A hotkey object, or nil if binding failed

methods.name: bindSpec
methods.signature: func bindSpec(_ mods: JSValue, _ key: String, _ message: String?, _ callbackPressed: JSValue, _ callbackReleased: JSValue) -> HSHotkeyObject?
methods.documentation:
Bind a hotkey with a message description
- Parameters:
- mods: An array of modifier key strings
- key: The key name or character
- message: A description of what this hotkey does (currently unused, for future features)
- callbackPressed: A JavaScript function to call when the hotkey is pressed
- callbackReleased: A JavaScript function to call when the hotkey is released
- Returns: A hotkey object, or nil if binding failed

returns.description: A hotkey object, or nil if binding failed

methods.name: getKeyCodeMap
methods.documentation:
Get the system-wide mapping of key names to key codes
- Returns: A dictionary mapping key names to numeric key codes

returns.description: A dictionary mapping key names to numeric key codes

methods.name: getModifierMap
methods.documentation:
Get the mapping of modifier names to modifier flags
- Returns: A dictionary mapping modifier names to their numeric values

returns.description: A dictionary mapping modifier names to their numeric values

methods.name: isEnabled
methods.documentation: Check if the hotkey is currently enabled

methods.name: delete
methods.documentation: Delete the hotkey (disables and clears callbacks)
